name: Zentaisen
description:
#PROLOGUE#

The world is in danger and you are the only pilot who dares to fight against the bad guys. Buckle up and go for a shooting spree!

#CONTROLS#

WASD = Move

J = Shoot

K = Launch Rocket if you have any

Space = to proceed in game start menu and before stage

Esc = End game

Del = Restart game

TAB = Toggle between fullscreenand windowed

#GAMEPLAY#
  • A classic snes style shmup .
  • Contains upgrades and special weapons.

*PS bugs are apparent, feedback appreciated! There was a mode7 stage after the first stage but time was my enemy.
